title: FK Budućnost Banovići
text:
Fudbalski klub Budućnost Banovići is a professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> club from the town of <a href="Banovi%C4%87i">Banovići</a> that is situated in the eastern part of <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>.
In <a href="Bosnian%20language">Bosnian</a> "Budućnost" means "Future", which symbolizes the hope people had for the times to come when the club was founded in 1947.
The club plays its home matches at the <a href="Gradski%20Stadion%20%28Banovi%C4%87i%29">Gradski Stadion</a>, which has a capacity of 8,500 seats. Their primary colors are dark green and black.
Today, Budućnost is a member of the <a href="Football%20Association%20of%20Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Football Association of Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>. The club is active in the <a href="First%20League%20of%20the%20Federation%20of%20Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">First League of the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>, which is the <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina%20football%20league%20system">second division of football</a> in Bosnia and Herzegovina.
Club seasons.
